column17:
Enhance your office look with this formal shirt from the house of Quiksilver. This button-down shirt has full-sleeves one patch pocket on the left chest and comes in slim fit. Pair it with well-fitted trousers for a corporate look.

Features
  • Fabric: Cotton
  • Colour: White
  • Pattern: Pin-stripes
  • Front: Full buttoned placket
  • Sleeves: Full-sleeves
  • Collar: Button-down collar
  • Pockets: Chest pocket
  • Back: Yoked
  • Hemline: Curved
  • Fit: Regular









Team it with black coloured trousers and formal shoes for a formal meeting.

Wash & Care
Do not bleach or dry clean
Wash with like colours
Line dry
Warm Iron"
